#summary Roadmap for upcoming releases


== CCAFS P&R v1.1.2 ==
*Planned release date:* December 2013

In reporting it is needed add new sub-sections, like Communications, Indicators and Leverages.

Also it's needed make improvements and adjustments in reporting subsections like Outcomes, Case studies, Publications and Deliverables.

----------

== CCAFS P&R v1.1.1 ==
*Planned release date:* October 1 2013

It is needed make some improvements into the planning section before the contact point users start the planning process for 2014 activities.

Also it is planned add some enhancements like a submit button in the forms, and a way to export the partners information into a XML file.

---------

== CCAFS P&R v1.0.1: Release notes ==

Version 1.0.1 was released on August 23, 2013

This version was released to fix an error reported by a science officer, also were fixed some less critical issues and added some improvements.

=== Issues resolved ===

Version 1.0 was released on July 5, 2013
